about_the_game:
Welcome to the BURN league, newbie! The world may have ended, but the fun is just about to begin. Because as they say, "it doesn't matter how bad the situation is... Humans still want to have some fun!". And we will have a lot of it! So what are you waiting for?

Game Modes:

  • Arcade: choose a car, choose a race track and show them what you can do!
  • Championship: seven championships are waiting for you. Finish every race in every environment and take part in few more, way longer and challenging championships.
  • Time Trial: how fast can you go? Which car is the fastest one? Go solo and race against the clock.
  • Versus: show your friend who's the boss here in this two player local multiplayer mode.
  • Mayhem mode: now this is where the fun begins! Try to survive on racing tracks full of traps and other dangers*.

  • Due to AI limitations, some races should only be played in time trial or versus mode. Of course you can try them in Arcade, but the AI won't be able to work properly. Look for the information on map preview.

main Features:

  • 20 old, RC rusty cars to choose from.
  • 18 normal races in many environments like abandoned houses, shops or warehouses.
  • 14 mayhem races. What can you expect? How about a bomb in your car: touch something, and BOOM! Or maybe a race full of traps that can be activated to destroy your opponents? Oh, they can do it as well so be careful.
  • One big map for exploration and treasure hunting (sorry, they're useless. Every valuable item has already been stolen).

name: Carpocalypse RC Racing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2.1+GHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 series or similar
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible

short_description: The World may be over, but the fun is just about to begin! Get ready to race in this post apocalyptic racing game. Visit abandoned warehouse, shops, dry lake, restaurants and few more to become the champion in Championship Mode. Warning! Versus mode can ruin your friendship!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish
*languages with full audio support
